entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
